Name: Distress Centre Durham Crisis Line
Subject: ['panic and anxiety', 'studying business', 'health and fitness', 'disorders', 'education', 'mental disorder']
Description: Distress Centre Durham helps people in distress to cope, by providing emotional support, crisis/suicide management and community education. Our values provide the philosophical foundations for all that we do, collectively and individually, with service users, responder volunteers, staff and our communities.
